Starting a new game will overwrite
your current save.

Are you certain to proceed?
You try to remember. Since when did you exist?
What are you? Human? No. The word sounds wrong.
You try to remember. Why are you here?\n
You remember the pleads,\nthe yearning which has called you into life....
\'Called\' into life? Yes, yes, of course.
You remember. You were wished into existence.
Prayers finally heard, hope given form.
You finally remember the word for your kind of\nexistence.

You observe the old city residing within your domain.
The wooden buildings are run-down and damaged,
most repairs only done in a sloppy manner.
Clearly, this place is ridden by poverty…

Observing the old city residing within your domain,
you see a variety of figures working diligently,
reparing the buildings and trading away.
However, marks of poverty still rule the city…

As your gaze wanders through the old city,
you see people praising their wares on the marketplace,
young folk are building an imitation of your shrine
and people are rushing in and out of the city…
You can feel that your power is still too weak,\nyour existence too insignificant to interfere with the city.\nMaybe you should come back at a later time…
